sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for using the Spill Control Kit for safe management of chemical or liquid spills.
sections.scope: Applicable to safety and maintenance activities in Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Identify the nature of the spilled material and assess risk.
Don appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, mask) from the kit.
Confine the spill using absorbent socks or barriers from the kit.
Apply absorbent pads or powders over the spill area.
Allow time for absorption and then collect used materials.
Place contaminated waste in the designated disposal bags.
Clean and decontaminate the floor surface as per protocol.
Report the incident and replenish the spill kit contents.
Document the spill details and cleanup actions in the safety log.
precautions: Do not attempt cleanup of unknown or highly toxic spills without assistance.
Ensure proper ventilation during the cleanup process.
Dispose of contaminated materials as hazardous waste.
Keep the spill kit easily accessible and regularly inspected.
Review MSDS of chemicals for specific neutralization requirements.
